macro.name: POLARITY
macro.description: Polarity type, BIPOLAR - polarity is stable; defaults to BIPOLAR

macro.name: USE_SLEW
macro.description: 1 to user slew, 0 otherwise; defaults to 0

macro.name: CALIBRATED
macro.description: 1 to use calibration file, 0 otherwise; defaults to 1

macro.name: CALIB_FILE
macro.description: Name of calibration File; defaults to default_calib.dat

macro.name: SP_AT_STARTUP
macro.description: Apply last setpoints at startup; defaults to NO

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_I
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to current; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_READ_V
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting reading to voltage; defaults to 1

macro.name: FACTOR_WRITE_I
macro.description: Factor to apply when converting current to set value; defaults to 1000

macro.name: MAX_RAW_SETPOINT
macro.description: Maximum raw setpoint to send to the power supply, in ppm. Defaults to 1000000 (100% of full scale).

macro.name: LOCAL_CALIB
macro.description: Use local instrument calibration directory instead of common one? Default is no.

macro.name: ADDRESS
macro.description: Address of the PSU; defaults to 0.
